DOC.brief_title: Intervention Veterans With Depression , Substance Disorder , Trauma
DOC.detailed_description: The goal study evaluate whether second disorder-specific intervention improve long term ( 18 month ) treatment outcome male female Veterans co-occurring depression alcohol/substance disorder trauma history ( without PTSD diagnosis ) . This 4 year randomize two-group design use repeated assessment baseline every 3 month total 12 month . The investigator provide recently develop integrate intervention comorbid depression substance disorder initial 12 week group format ( Integrated Cognitive Behavioral Therapy ; Phase I ) . After 12 week group intervention , participant randomize receive either review initial intervention individual session , trauma-specific intervention , Cognitive Processing Therapy , integrated addiction treatment component . Length , duration , set intervention , participant meet program psychiatrist medication appointment . No medication study placebo use ; medication prescribe use standard VA protocol . Research assessments document diagnosis , recent substance use , depression PTSD symptom , medication adherence , life stress .
